::DeathStorm/Shredder/Prowl::

DeathStorm looks at Shredder. "I am ... no one." He says.

Suddenly, he pulls out his gun and shoots Shredder in the chest. With a 
grunt, Shredder falls backwards into a tree.

He looks up at DeathStorm's gun lowered at his face. His fingers tap several 
keys on his wrist, sending a distress call to the rest of Megatron's troops.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Prowl is blown backwards against a boulder. He jumps over it and fires an 
acid pellet at Injector. He grinds his teeth as Manterror's ion disk goes 
through the boulder and hits him in the leg. He fires an acid pellet at 
Manterror.
